alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lafayette; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 1:54PM EDT until July 16 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lafayette County in Big Bend of Florida... Central Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Northern Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 154 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles northwest of Perry, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mayo, Madison, Perry, Greenville, Lee, Ebb, Lamont, Buckville, Eridu, Cabbage Grove, Scanlon, Foley, Perry-Foley Airport, Hampton Springs, Sirmans, Shady Grove, Iddo, Moseley Hall, Chancey and Secotan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
